languages.text: "Вероятно. С рассветом они собираются на его границах и кружатся в необузданном танце, воют, сметают с пути все живое и рассыпаются на тысячи угасающих вспышек. Агрокомплексы же, которые захватывает их танец, приходят в негодность".

"It is likely. They gather at its borders at the break of dawn and whirl in a wild dance, howling and destroying all living things, then disperse into thousands of fading flashes. The agricultural facilities that happen to be in the way of their dance fall into disrepair."
languages.original_text: "Вероятно. С рассветом они собираются на его границах и кружатся в необузданном танце, воют, сметают с пути все живое и рассыпаются на тысячи угасающих вспышек. Агрокомплексы же, которые захватывает их танец, приходят в негодность".

traits.locale_text: "it is likely. They gather at the borders at dusk and whirl in an wild dance, howl, destroy all the living beings and disperse into thousands of fading flashes afterwards. The agricultural facilities that happen to be in the way of their dance, fall into disrepair."

"it is likely. They gather at the borders at dusk and whirl in an wild dance, howl, destroy all the living beings and disperse into thousands of fading flashes afterwards. The agricultural facilities that happen to be in the way of their dance, fall into disrepair."

"It is likely. They gather at the borders at dusk and whirl in a wild dance, howl, destroy all nearby living beings and afterwards disperse into thousands of fading flashes. The agricultural facilities that happen to be in the way of their dance fall into disrepair."

"It is likely. They gather at its borders at the break of dawn and whirl in a wild dance, howling and destroying all living things, then disperse into thousands of fading flashes. The agricultural facilities that happen to be in the way of their dance fall into disrepair."

languages.text: “很有可能。黎明即将来临时，他们聚集在腐化区域的边缘，狂舞、嚎叫，杀死附近所有活着的东西，而后又化作无数闪光消失不见。那些碰巧妨碍他们舞蹈的农业设施都报废了。”
languages.original_text: "It is likely. They gather at its borders at the break of dawn and whirl in a wild dance, howling and destroying all living things, then disperse into thousands of fading flashes. The agricultural facilities that happen to be in the way of their dance fall into disrepair."

traits.locale_text: “很有可能。黎明即将来临时，他们聚集在腐化区域的边缘，狂舞、嚎叫，杀死附近所有活着的东西，而后又化作无数闪光消失不见。那些碰巧妨碍他们舞蹈的农业设施都报废了。”

languages.text: «Es probable. Se reúnen en las fronteras al amanecer y, en una danza salvaje, aúllan, destruyen a todos los seres vivos cercanos y después se dispersan en miles de destellos. Las instalaciones agrícolas que se encuentran en el camino de su baile acaban en ruinas».
languages.original_text: "It is likely. They gather at its borders at the break of dawn and whirl in a wild dance, howling and destroying all living things, then disperse into thousands of fading flashes. The agricultural facilities that happen to be in the way of their dance fall into disrepair."

traits.locale_text: «Es probable. Se reúnen en las fronteras al amanecer y, en una danza salvaje, aúllan, destruyen a todos los seres vivos cercanos y después se dispersan en miles de destellos. Las instalaciones agrícolas que se encuentran en el camino de su baile acaban en ruinas».

languages.text: 「おそらくそうでしょう。彼らは夜明けに国境に集まり、荒々しい舞で旋回し、吠え、近くの命あるものすべてを抹殺し、その後、何千もの消えてしまいそうな閃光となって散ってゆくのです。偶然奴らの舞の邪魔になったしまった農業施設は荒れ果ててしまうでしょう」
languages.original_text: "It is likely. They gather at its borders at the break of dawn and whirl in a wild dance, howling and destroying all living things, then disperse into thousands of fading flashes. The agricultural facilities that happen to be in the way of their dance fall into disrepair."

traits.locale_text: 「おそらくそうでしょう。彼らは夕暮れ時に国境に集まり、荒々しい舞で旋回し、吠え、近くの命あるものすべてを抹殺し、その後、何千もの消えてしまいそうな閃光となって散ってゆくのです。偶然奴らの舞の邪魔になったしまった農業施設は荒れ果ててしまうでしょう」
「おそらくそうでしょう。彼らは夕暮れ時に国境に集まり、荒々しい舞で旋回し、吠え、近くの命あるものすべてを抹殺し、その後、何千もの消えてしまいそうな閃光となって散ってゆくのです。偶然奴らの舞の邪魔になったしまった農業施設は荒れ果ててしまうでしょう」

languages.text: « C'est probable. Ils se massent aux frontières au lever du jour et s'abandonnent à une danse fiévreuse, pendant laquelle ils massacrent tous les êtres vivants passant à leur portée en hurlant, avant de se disperser en une myriade d'éclairs fugaces. Les infrastructures agricoles qui ont le malheur de se trouver sur leur passage sont réduites en charpie. »
languages.original_text: "It is likely. They gather at its borders at the break of dawn and whirl in a wild dance, howling and destroying all living things, then disperse into thousands of fading flashes. The agricultural facilities that happen to be in the way of their dance fall into disrepair."

traits.locale_text: « C'est probable. Ils se massent aux frontières au lever du jour et s'abandonnent à une danse fiévreuse, pendant laquelle ils massacrent tous les êtres vivants passant à leur portée en hurlant, avant de se disperser en une myriade d'éclairs fugaces. Les infrastructures agricoles qui ont le malheur de se trouver sur leur passage sont réduites en charpie. »

languages.text: "Vermutlich. Sie versammeln sich am Abend an den Grenzen zu einem wilden Tanz und zerstören mit lautem Geheul alle lebenden Dinge, ehe sie sich mit Tausenden von Blitzen auflösen. Die landwirtschaftlichen Einrichtungen, die ihrem Tanz zufällig im Weg sind, verfallen."
languages.original_text: "It is likely. They gather at its borders at the break of dawn and whirl in a wild dance, howling and destroying all living things, then disperse into thousands of fading flashes. The agricultural facilities that happen to be in the way of their dance fall into disrepair."

traits.locale_text: "Vermutlich. Sie versammeln sich am Abend an den Grenzen zu einem wilden Tanz und zerstören mit lautem Geheul alle lebenden Dinge, ehe sie sich mit Tausenden von Blitzen auflösen. Die landwirtschaftlichen Einrichtungen, die ihrem Tanz zufällig im Weg sind, verfallen."

"Vermutlich. Sie versammeln sich in der Abenddämmerung an den Grenzen und wirbeln in einem wilden Tanz umher, heulen, zerstören alle Lebewesen in der Nähe und lösen sich danach in tausende von Blitzen auf, die langsam verblassen. Die landwirtschaftlichen Einrichtungen, die ihrem Tanz zufällig im Weg sind, zerfallen."

languages.text: "Muhtemelen. Şafak sökerken sınırlarında toplanıp vahşi bir dansla dönüyor, uluyor ve yaşayan her şeyi yok ediyorlar. Ardından solup giden binlerce ışığa ayrılıyorlar. Şans eseri danslarının ortasında kalan tarım tesisleriyse harabeye dönüyor."
languages.original_text: "It is likely. They gather at its borders at the break of dawn and whirl in a wild dance, howling and destroying all living things, then disperse into thousands of fading flashes. The agricultural facilities that happen to be in the way of their dance fall into disrepair."
